channel.title: Galaxy Pk/PvM 317 Beta
channel.description:
Galaxy Pk/Pvm is my new Pk/PvM server it is only in Beta right now and isn't 24/7 yet but it will be getting updating daily and will be up a lot. The server, webclient, and forums are all hosted on my home computer so I can monitor them constantly.
The server isn't 24/7 yet so I will be posting the status here with the date and time U.S Eastern Time.
[size=14pt]7:15 pm 5/27 Server is: Offline [/size]
Webclient-[url=http://galaxypk.zapto.org/client/Webclient.html]http://galaxypk.zapto.org/client/Webclient.html[/url] Downloadable Client-[url=http://galaxypk.zapto.org/client/GalaxyPkClient.rar]http://galaxypk.zapto.org/client/GalaxyPkClient.rar[/url] Forums-[url=http://galaxypk.zapto.org/forums]http://galaxypk.zapto.org/forums[/url]
***Features***
All skills working Advanced Slayer system and interfaces Ability to cancel and permanently remove tasks Impling hunting with kinglies Gem rocks Unidentified herbs for economy Working clue scrolls Lottery system Random rewards box costing 10m for anything from rune to third-age and the 10m goes into the lottery fund Working hand-cannon Max cash voucher and max tokkul voucher Buy&Sell-X With no lagging Player owned shops Slayer helmet bonus and other set bonuses Unique pet bosses Slayer Points Slayer Streak with higher points rewarded Pk Points Pk Streak with rewards Boss kill counts Nice quest tab/achievement tab interfaces Unique zoom in & out buttons Working price checker Working party room All prayers and curses working Exp lock Vote for rewards Tohkaar-Kal cape (New Fire Cape) Dragonfire shield activate works with timer And theirs a ton more stuff, i'm not gonna sit here and claim i coded everything in here from scratch however their are quite a few things i did code from scratch and a lot of the stuff i listed where things I added/fixed and their are also a lot of things i added from tutorials or converted from another source and credits go to where they are due for that but i'm being honest about this server feel free to look up the source i used oraclescape and you'll see how much work i've done to make this server better.
***Reasons to join now***
The server may not be 24/7 yet but considering i'm hosting it on my computer chances are if the servers up I will be on it or monitoring it
The server is Beta right now meaning it's not 100% yet. Their are bound to be some glitches and bugs but some may work to the players advantage. For example some things like the random reward box might still give to expensive rewards making it easy to obtain cash until I fix it. I've tested it and it seems fine for now but i'm only 1 person I can't be certain it's gonna be the same when a lot of people are using it. So long story short it might be easier to obtain cash and items now so takeadvantage of that and join now!
Another good incentive for joining is rares. Most rares are obtainable now through drops from bosses, the random rewards box and a few other ways and as they are obtained their rarity will be increased and when theirs a sufficient amount in the game they will no longer be able to be obtained so get them while you can!
Going along with what I previously said about being able to get things easier Pkers and people who like to kill monsters might find it easier to obtain certain things.
Joining now also means you'll be able to influence what happens to the server, what updates are made and what content is added.
[img]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/Showoff1.png[/img] [img]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/Showoff2.png[/img] [img]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/Showoff3.png[/img] [img]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/Showoff4.png[/img] [img]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/Showoff5.png[/img]

item.title: Galaxy Pk/PvM 317 Beta
item.dc:creator: @I_Smoke_Kush I Smoke Kush
item.description:
@I_Smoke_Kush wrote:

download package: http://surefile.org/file/0TY897

Features

All skills working
Advanced Slayer system and interfaces
Ability to cancel and permanently remove tasks
Impling hunting with kinglies
Gem rocks
Unidentified herbs for economy
Working clue scrolls
Lottery system
Random rewards box costing 10m for anything from rune to third-age and the 10m goes into the lottery fund
Working hand-cannon
Max cash voucher and max tokkul voucher
Buy&Sell-X With no lagging
Player owned shops
Slayer helmet bonus and other set bonuses
Unique pet bosses
Slayer Points
Slayer Streak with higher points rewarded
Pk Points
Pk Streak with rewards
Boss kill counts
Nice quest tab/achievement tab interfaces
Unique zoom in & out buttons
Working price checker
Working party room
All prayers and curses working
Exp lock
Vote for rewards
Tohkaar-Kal cape (New Fire Cape)
Dragonfire shield activate works with timer
And theirs a ton more stuff, i’m not gonna sit here and claim i coded everything in here from scratch however their are quite a few things i did code from scratch and a lot of the stuff i listed where things I added/fixed and their are also a lot of things i added from tutorials or converted from another source and credits go to where they are due for that but i’m being honest about this server feel free to look up the source i used oraclescape and you’ll see how much work i’ve done to make this server better.

please give me credits if you going to host






[/quote]

Read full topic

@thugnit1019 wrote:

Galaxy Pk/Pvm is my new Pk/PvM server it is only in Beta right now and isn’t 24/7 yet but it will be getting updating daily and will be up a lot. The server, webclient, and forums are all hosted on my home computer so I can monitor them constantly.

The server isn’t 24/7 yet so I will be posting the status here with the date and time U.S Eastern Time.

[size=14pt]7:15 pm 5/27 Server is: Offline [/size]

Downloadable Client-http://galaxypk.zapto.org/client/GalaxyPkClient.rar

Features

And theirs a ton more stuff, i’m not gonna sit here and claim i coded everything in here from scratch however their are quite a few things i did code from scratch and a lot of the stuff i listed where things I added/fixed and their are also a lot of things i added from tutorials or converted from another source and credits go to where they are due for that but i’m being honest about this server feel free to look up the source i used oraclescape and you’ll see how much work i’ve done to make this server better.

Reasons to join now

The server may not be 24/7 yet but considering i’m hosting it on my computer chances are if the servers up I will be on it or monitoring it

The server is Beta right now meaning it’s not 100% yet. Their are bound to be some glitches and bugs but some may work to the players advantage. For example some things like the random reward box might still give to expensive rewards making it easy to obtain cash until I fix it. I’ve tested it and it seems fine for now but i’m only 1 person I can’t be certain it’s gonna be the same when a lot of people are using it. So long story short it might be easier to obtain cash and items now so takeadvantage of that and join now!

Another good incentive for joining is rares. Most rares are obtainable now through drops from bosses, the random rewards box and a few other ways and as they are obtained their rarity will be increased and when theirs a sufficient amount in the game they will no longer be able to be obtained so get them while you can!

Going along with what I previously said about being able to get things easier Pkers and people who like to kill monsters might find it easier to obtain certain things.

Joining now also means you’ll be able to influence what happens to the server, what updates are made and what content is added.
